message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. Given its value, I believe a starting price of $15,000 is fair. What do you think?

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my spending within a certain budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $10,000? I appreciate your consideration.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest and counteroffer. While I'm willing to negotiate, $10,000 is significantly below its true value. Could you meet me halfway at $12,500?

Hello Alice, I've given your last offer careful consideration. While I understand the value of the product, I am still seeking to stay within my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $12,000?
